mapper.select:
select a.store_redpackets_id, a.redpackage_id, a.redpackage_money, a.redpackage_content, a.enddate, a.set_id, a.set_type, date_format(a.createdate ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createdate, c.redpackage_type, b.store_name from tb_member_redpackets a join tb_store_redpackets c on c.store_redpackets_id=a.store_redpackets_id join tb_store b on a.set_id=b.store_id
where a.member_id=#{member_id} and a.isshiyong='0'
and a.isguoqi=#{isguoqi}
order by a.createdate desc

select redpackage_id from tb_member_redpackets where member_id=#{member_id} and isshiyong='0'
and isguoqi=#{isguoqi}

select a.store_redpackets_id, a.redpackage_id, a.redpackage_money, a.redpackage_type, a.redpackage_content, a.enddate, a.set_id, a.set_type, b.redpackage_type as store_redpackage_type, b.srp_usercondition_id from tb_member_redpackets a join tb_store_redpackets b on b.store_redpackets_id=a.store_redpackets_id where a.member_id=#{member_id} and a.isguoqi='0' and a.isshiyong='0' and ( (a.set_type = '1' and a.set_id=#{store_id} ) or (a.set_type = '2') ) order by cast(a.redpackage_money as decimal(10,2))
mapper.update: update tb_member_redpackets set member_id = #{newmember_id}, isshiyong='0', iszhuanzeng='0' where member_id=#{member_id} and redpackage_id =#{redpackage_id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_ms_redpackage( ms_redpackage_id, user_id, user_type, redpackage_money, redpackage_type, redpackage_number, content, createtime ) values ( #{ms_redpackage_id}, #{user_id}, #{user_type}, #{redpackage_money}, ifnull(#{redpackage_type},'2'), ifnull(#{redpackage_number},'1'), #{content}, now() )

select a.redpackage_id, a.enddate from tb_member_redpackets a
